item.title: Deploy a Hugo Blog on Github Pages
item.description: Hugo: Deploy a website A personal blog is a perfect place to let the world know about you and showcase your past accomplishments. Put your resume, your projects, your blogs in with a personalized theme which makes people know you have a great taste: all-in-one! Itâ€™s your portfolio displayed online, a small yet cool project you can do with not much effort, why not? With Github Pages, we can host a personal webpage without bothering about finding a domain name, and with Hugo, we have a variety of themes to choose from.
